description: This file defines the main component of a Tic Tac Toe game using React.

methods.name: calculateWinner
methods.description: Determines the winner of the game based on defined winning combinations.

methods.name: isDraw
methods.description: Checks if the game is a draw by ensuring all squares are filled.

methods.name: handleClick
methods.description: Handles click events on the board to update the game state.

methods.name: resetGame
methods.description: Resets the game state to its initial configuration.
